RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYRRH had good position early angled out three wide in the stretch, drew clear, driving. V K STAR was unhurried early, rallied in the stretch on the inside and was up for place. STORMY BELLA set the pace until the top of the stretch and weakened slightly. V K PRINCESS was unhurried early early and improved late while no threat. SPEEDY FIRE raced mid pack and went evenly. ARTUME allowed to settle early, swung wide and was no threat. GREGS POSSE contended until mid stretch and weakened late. CURRENT CAUSE allowed to settle, failed to menace. VERMONT HOLIDAY pressed early and was through after a half.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAYWING was well placed early on the inside, angled out four wide in the stretch, gained a clear in lead in mid stretch and lasted late under firm handling. EMPIRE'S FIRE was never far back early, rallied at the top of the stretch, split horses and finished well to just miss. CLAW raced mid pack early, swung wide in the stretch and closed willingly. YOU MAKE ME HAPPY dueled early, shook clear on the turn, weakened late. BULLION allowed to settle, failed to menace. UPGRADE AL dueled early and came up empty in the stretch.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: LILLY CHROME was well placed on the inside, rallied in the stretch on the rail, quickly drew off late under firm handling to win as much the best. RACE.FOOTNOTES: PHARAOH'S PROPHECY quickly made the lead from the inside, was nicely rated on the front end, led throughout and remained clear late under firm handling. GET ALONG contended early and tired on the far turn.
